pinyin: you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3

definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: These two who have true love marry and have the crystal of their love finally.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個有情人終成眷屬並且擁有了他們愛情的結晶。

sentences.english: Some of Shakespeare's comedies are ended by a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞的一些喜劇以有情人終成眷屬結束。

sentences.english: For the other people's happiness let a way, don't is also a very happy affair.
sentences.chinese: 不也是很幸福的一件事情祝天下的有情人終成眷屬。

sentences.english: Just after midnight, the partners of 11 years were married.
sentences.chinese: 子夜剛過，這對11年來的有情人終成眷屬。

sentences.english: I wish a happy life lovers get married is a representative.
sentences.chinese: 祝有情人終成眷屬是幸福生活的代表。

sentences.english: And one of the plot, the similar result is jack shall have Jill.
sentences.chinese: 和1類似的劇情，最後的結局也是有情人終成眷屬。

sentences.english: As you know, all shall be well, and Jack shall have Jill. At last, Jim married Mary.
sentences.chinese: 有情人終成眷屬，吉姆終於和瑪麗結婚了。

sentences.english: Wish each couple of lovers together.
sentences.chinese: 祝天下有情人終成眷屬。

sentences.english: Two lovers become spouses eventually, home Yang from this much brave of a women will.
sentences.chinese: 兩位有情人終成眷屬，楊家自此又多了一位巾幗勇將。

sentences.english: May you lovers eventually become spouse!
It would be great if the lovers got married.
sentences.chinese: 如果有情人終成眷屬那就好了。

sentences.english: Yes, the lover should get married.

sentences.chinese: 祝天下所有的有情人終成眷屬。
